table.name: leg_interim_point
table.description: This table stores the details of the intermediate locations within a specified leg.

columns.name: LEG_GID
columns.description: Contains the GID for the leg.

columns.name: SEQ_NO
columns.description: Contains the sequence number for the leg.

columns.name: LOCATION_GID
columns.description: Contains the GID for the location for the leg.

columns.name: SPECIAL_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The special service needed for this interim point. It will be added to the corresponding shipment stop special service.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.
